name: JavaScript
description: Practice core JavaScript, DOM interactions, and logic building.

topics.name: Basics
questions: Explain the difference between let, const, and var.
How does hoisting work in JavaScript?
What are truthy and falsy values?

topics.name: Arrays & Objects
questions: How do you clone an array or object safely?
Explain the difference between map, filter, and reduce.
How would you remove duplicates from an array?

topics.name: DOM
questions: How do you select and update DOM elements?
Explain the difference between innerText and innerHTML.
